name: @the-working-party/liquid-docs
description: A parser for Shopify liquid doc tags using Rust/WASM

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir pkg && rm -f pkg/.gitignore && rm -f pkg/README.md && rm -f pkg/LICENSE && rm -f pkg/package.json
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:ts
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:rust && npm run test:js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

author: The Working Party
